altTitles.ja: かのかり
彼女、お借りします

altTitles.vi: Dịch Vụ Cho Thuê Bạn Gái

description.en:
Kinoshita Kazuya is a regular college student who was just dumped by his girlfriend for another guy. Feeling down in the dumps, he decides to use an app called Diamond to hire Mizuhara Chizuru, a rental girlfriend, to make himself feel better. From their first meeting, she seems to be the perfect girl for him, but is there more to her than meets the eye? And how will their not quite typical relationship develop?

---
**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)
description.fr: Kinoshita Kazuya est un étudiant régulier qui vient d'être largué par sa petite amie pour un autre gars. Se sentant dans les décharges, il décide d'utiliser une application appelée Diamond pour embaucher Mizuhara Chizuru, une petite amie de location, afin de se sentir mieux. Dès leur première rencontre, elle semble être la fille parfaite pour lui, mais est-ce qu'il y a autre chose pour elle que ce qui est à l'oeil? Et comment va se développer leur relation pas tout à fait typique?
description.it: Kinoshita Kazuya è un normale studente universitario che è stato appena lasciato dalla sua ragazza. Devastato, decide di usare un app chiamata "Diamond" per reclutare Mizuhara Chizuru, una ragazza a noleggio per tirargli su il morale. Fin dal loro primo incontro, sembra essere la ragazza perfetta per lui, ma ci sarà altro dietro a quell'immagine da "brava ragazza"…? E come si evolverà la loro inusuale relazione?
description.pt: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar uma aplicação de relacionamentos depois de ter levado terminado com a sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!
description.ru: Двадцатилетний никудышный студент университета муниципального района Киносита Кадзуя. Встреча с «особенной» красавицей ознаменует начало изменений в его жизни?!
description.es-la: Kinoshita Kazuya es un estudiante universitario normal al que su novia acaba de dejar por otro chico. Sintiéndose deprimido, decide usar una aplicación llamada Diamond para contratar a Mizuhara Chizuru, una novia de alquiler, para sentirse mejor. Desde su primer encuentro con ella, parece ser la chica perfecta para él, pero ¿hay más en ella de lo que parece? ¿Y cómo se desarrollará su relación no muy típica?
description.pt-br: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar um aplicativo de relacionamentos depois de ter levado um fora de sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!

title.en: Kuroko no Basket - Tsukumo no Koiwazurai (Doujinshi)

description.en: Pairing: Akashi Seijuurou x Kuroko Tetsuya

title.en: The Undetectable Strongest Job: Rule Breaker

altTitles.ja-ro: Sacchi Sarenai Saikyou Shoku Rule Breaker

altTitles.ja: 察知されない最強職《ルール・ブレイカー》

description.en:
By some ill fortune, Hikaru died in a traffic accident. He was in heaven standing in line, waiting to be judged, when he took an unexpected request to transfer his soul to a person in another world. He received an ability called Soul Board which he could use to allocate points to Skills to make himself more powerful. But there was a catch…「I want you to kill someone for me within an hour. If you don’t, I’ll destroy your soul.」To pull off the task assigned to him, he poured all his available points to the Stealth skill tree.  
  
This is a story of a boy who specialized in Stealth. With his skill trees as weapons, he would demonstrate his unrivaled strength in another world.

altTitles.ja: 二度と自撮り送ってやんない！

altTitles.en: I'll never send a selfie again!

altTitles.ru: Я больше никогда не буду отправлять тебе селфи!

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Mi amigo de la infancia no deja de pedirme una selfie para usarlo como referencia para su dibujo, ¿Qué hago?

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - UmaYome Uma X Tore♂ Kekkon Seikatsu Goudou (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: ウマ嫁　ウマ×トレ♂結婚生活合同

description.en: An anthology book series containing many different artists and their favorite Umas enjoying their life after marriage.

The raid failed. 

In a desperate situation due to the impending suicide bombing of the dungeon boss, Lee Gon-woo was betrayed by his teammates, and abandoned in the boss’s room. Just when he thought it was all over, a dagger suddenly fell into his hands. And from that moment his life changed dramatically.

His life was saved, but all the levels he gained with such difficulty have reset, making him level 1.

[You have caught a "mosquito". Your level has increased.]

"My level should have gone up, but why is nothing happening?!"
description.ru:
Рэйд провалился. 
В отчаянном положении из-за готовящегося самоподрыва босса данжа преданный тиммейтами Ли Гон-у остался один в комнате босса.
Когда он думал, что уже всё кончено, неожиданно в его руки попадает кинжал. И с этого момента его жизнь кардинально меняется.
Его жизнь спасена, но он снова вернулся на первый уровень, который с таким трудом поднимал...
[Вы поймали "комара". Ваш уровень повышен.]
Действительно, уровень должен был подняться, но почему никаких изменений?

description.en: There was someone who set out after receiving orders from the Absolute One who first unified the continent to learn the secret of immortality. He believed that he would definitely discover the secret of immortality even if he had to travel all over the world. He never returned until the Absolute died and the empire collapsed, leaving behind only numerous speculations and gradually being forgotten in people's memories. And after a long time...
description.ru:
От создателя знаменитой манхвы «Мастер»! 
 
Могучий правитель, объединивший континент, послал своего самого отважного воина на поиски секрета бессмертия. Правитель был уверен, что тайна бессмертия будет раскрыта, даже если придётся искать её по всему миру. Однако... тот так и не вернулся. Правитель скончался. Империя пала. О воине ещё долго говорили, но со временем люди начали забывать и его. И вот, спустя многие годы...

altTitles.ja: 白蛇のはなむこ

description.en:
A white snake who is a divine messenger and a childhood friend with a mystery. Entangled obsessions in a Japanese-style fantasy.
Tsubaki, a high school student with a predisposition for bad luck, has a one-sided love for his childhood friend Sakuya, who is both beautiful and talented. Then, one day while leaving school they are randomly attacked on the street.

In the ancient capital Kyoto, a lovestory defying fate unfolds.

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

title.en: Boku no Suki na Hito ga Suki na Hito

altTitles.ja: ぼくの好きな人が好きな人

altTitles.zh-hk: 我喜歡的人所喜歡的人

description.en: This story begins when the protagonist, a boy named Sora Akizuki, confesses his love to Miya Fuwa, a girl he has been in love with for a long time, and is rejected. When Sora learns that Miya likes someone else, he visits the dubious “Trialing Club," of which he is president, and tries to find out if he is the right person for her. The first episode shows the reality of the Trialing Club, whose activities one cannot imagine from its name, and the reason why its president, Suzukaze, created the club.
description.ru: Эта история начинается с того, что главный герой, мальчик по имени Сора Акидзуки, признается в любви Мие Фува, девушке, в которую он давно влюблен, и получает отказ. Когда Сора узнает, что Мия любит другого, он посещает сомнительный “Эксперементальный клуб”, президентом которого является этот незнакомец, и пытается выяснить, подходит ли он ей. В первом эпизоде показана реальность Эксперементального клуба, деятельность которого невозможно представить, исходя из его названия, и причина, по которой его президент Судзукадзе создал этот клуб.
description.vi:
Câu chuyện này bắt đầu khi nhân vật chính, một chàng trai tên Sora Akizuki, thú nhận tình yêu của mình với Miya Fuwa, một cô gái mà anh đã yêu từ lâu nhưng bị từ chối. Khi Sora biết rằng Miya thích một người khác, anh ấy đã đến thăm “Câu lạc bộ thử việc” đáng ngờ mà anh ấy là chủ tịch, và cố gắng tìm hiểu xem anh ấy có phải là người phù hợp với cô ấy không.
Tập đầu tiên cho thấy thực tế của Câu lạc bộ Thử nghiệm, những hoạt động mà người ta không thể tưởng tượng được từ cái tên của nó, và lý do tại sao chủ tịch của nó, Suzukaze, lại thành lập câu lạc bộ.
description.es-la: Está historia empieza cuando el protagonista, un chico llamado Sora Akizuki, confiesa su amor a Miya Fuwa, una chica de la que está enamorado desde hace tiempo, y es rechazado. Cuando Sora se entera de que a Miya le gusta otra persona, visita el dudoso "Club de Ensayos", del que es presidente, e intenta averiguar si es la persona adecuada para ella. El primer episodio muestra la realidad del Club de Ensayos, cuyas actividades no se puede imaginar por su nombre, y la razón por la que su presidente, Suzukaze, creó el club.

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

altTitles.ja: 魔力9999万 全属性使いの大賢者

altTitles.ja-ro: Maryoku 9999 man Zen Zokusei Tsukai no Dai Kenja

description.en:
Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
All over the world, Monsters suddenly began appearing. The only person who could save humanity from “The Calamity” was “The Great Sage”, Ichikami Atsumu.
But, despite being satisfied in his death, he was reincarnated into the body of a boy who was bullied into killing himself, Kusanagi Minato.
Atsumu, waking up in a Japan fifty years into the future, is shocked to see a peaceful world, and where magic has become far weaker compared to when he was alive.
For now, Atsumu decides to go back to Kamui Magic Academy as Minato, but learns that mages are nothing more than a relic of the past, and in their place exist a class of privileged nobles
.After blowing off his bragging, low-levelled bullies, Atsumu gains the interest of a noble magician girl, Mizuha Yuika, as well as his schoolmates and teachers.
What’s more, Atsumu finds a sign that the Calamity, which was supposed to have been subdued, will return––
“It looks like my power is still needed”
Within the soul of student lies the Great Sage?!
The strongest Great Sage will change this world drunk on peace.
With his reincarnation in the future set, the curtain opens on a new Hero’s story!

altTitles.ja: 蜃気樓綺譚

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Mirage is an old-fashioned bar on a street corner. Men who are lost in life come to the mirage, transcending time and space, and become captivated by Maya, the beautiful proprietress. What do the defeated men want from Maya? 

A bewitching and sad story of men by Leiji Matsumoto.

altTitles.ja: 百瀬アキラの初恋破綻中。

altTitles.vi: Mối Tình Đầu Của Akira Momose Đang Trên Bờ Vực Đổ Vỡ

description.en:
Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire.

Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach.

And there was a “fate” that was more than he could have imagined.
description.ja:
ド田舎に暮らす少年・久我山はじめのもとに帰ってきた、かつての憧れの同級生・百瀬アキラ。

彼女を遠くから眺めて、甘酸っぱい青春を謳歌しよう…と思っていた矢先に、アキラからまさかのアプローチが。

そしてそこには、想像以上の”運命”が拡がってました。

2人の様子を、どうぞあったかく見守ってください。
description.tr: Taşrada yaşayan bir çocuk olan Kugayama Hajime’nin, eskiden hayranlık duyduğu sınıf arkadaşı Momose Akira geri döner. Tam onu uzaktan izleyip tatlı ekşi gençliğinin tadını çıkarmak üzereyken, Akira beklenmedik bir yaklaşımda bulunur. Ve hayal edebileceğinden de öte bir “kader” ile karşılaşır.

altTitles.th: อ่านชะตาวันสิ้นโลก

altTitles.ja: 全知的な読者の視点から

altTitles.vi: Góc nhìn của Độc giả Toàn tri

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

title.en: I Became the Contract Daughter of the Soon-to-Be-Ruined Family

altTitles.ko: 곧 망할 가문의 계약직 딸이 되었다

description.en:
I thought I had regressed from this ragged life, but why has my time-limited life remained the same?
I'm ruined... is this how I should live my life...?

"This time, I'll get adopted by a normal family, and live in comfort for the rest of my life!"

Step by step, I'm going to take revenge against the one behind my death, and I'll protect what's left of my small and precious life!

However, did I put in too much effort?

"Anisha, you're perfect."

"I'm going to make this child a future professor."

All I wanted was to survive...

"Well, somehow, you’ve passed. I'll have to adopt this brat."

I ended up with a tycoon I didn't expect.
One whose household will be massacred in a few years!

How do I know that?
Me too! I didn't want to! Know that!

But what can I do? The milk has already been spilt.
I'll just live in bliss while acting as the real daughter during my 5 years contract, then I'll leave!

However...

"...I happened to pick this up on the way home."
"Father, you're the best!"
"I know."

...Something's wrong.

"I checked this out 'myself', and inspected it 'in person'. There's nothing to be grateful for."
"Father, you're a genius!"
"I know this too."

No, well, something's REALLY wrong.

**

I became fond of this unique and strange family, but...

"The five years contract we signed,"
"Let's nullify it."

While looking straight into my eyes, dad announced the termination.

"I can help you, but you'll still die anyway."

Not only that,
But death came under my nose too.

Will I be able to survive?

altTitles.ja: パンプキンナイト

description.en: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.
description.ja: ある日、女子高生・中谷明日美は、SNSで「パンプキンナイト」という見知らぬアカウントからフォローされる。 『中谷明日美コロス』というメッセージが届いた直後、カボチャのマスクを被った殺人鬼に襲われ惨死する。 そして偶然、明日美と通話していた和也にも死の宣告が突きつけられ……。
description.kk: Бет әлпеті қатты зақымданған, оқушы қыз, бұрын оны келеке еткен адамдардың жандарын алу үшін, ауруханадан қашып шығады.
description.pt: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que a maltrataram no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.
description.pt-br: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que fizeram bullying com ela no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.

description.en:
Some parents give their kids an inheritance. Some give their kids a car. Jinwon's parents gave him… a motel. And not even a great one. Rundown and in need of massive repairs, the Ballantine Motel used to be a golden goose. But, of course, a drunk driver running his car through the entrance tends to change things.  
  
So when Jinwon takes over, he makes some upgrades and additions. And while "Ballantine" is a nice name, it's a bit long. So, of course, he makes the obvious choice and shortens it. The BL Motel is the neighborhood's newest addition. Of course, now all Jinwon needs is some new help and maybe find out why so many gay couples have started visiting. Then again, when life give you lemons, you lean in and stock the vending machines with lube.
description.fr: Certains parents donnent un héritage à leurs enfants. Certains donnent à leurs enfants une voiture. Les parents de Jinwon lui ont donné… un motel. Et même pas un grand. Un délabré et nécessitant d’importantes réparations, le motel Ballantine avait l’habitude d’être une poule aux oeufs d’or. Mais, bien sûr, un chauffeur ivre qui le traverse avec sa voiture a tendance à changer les choses. Alors, quand Jinwon prend la relève, il fait des améliorations et des ajouts. Et bien que « Ballantine » soit un joli nom, il est un peu long. Alors, bien sûr, il fait le choix évident et le raccourcit. Le BL Motel est la dernière nouveauté du quartier. Bien sûr, maintenant, tout ce dont Jinwon a besoin, c’est d’un nouvel employé et peut-être de découvrir pourquoi tant de couples gays ont commencé à le visiter.

description.en:
The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!
description.pt-br: O mundo mergulhou numa era gelada e 95% da humanidade foi exterminada! Em sua vida anterior, nosso herói Zhang Yi foi tragicamente morto pelas mesmas pessoas que ajudou, graças ao seu bom coração. Mas não tema, pois Zhang Yi renasceu e agora possui o incrível poder de manipulação do espaço! Ele ficou completamente maluco acumulando suprimentos para o apocalipse gelado e está pronto para governar o deserto congelado! Ele promete desencadear cem vezes mais dor naqueles que o prejudicaram no passado!

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

description.en:
In high school, Keita Tsukiji was slender and had feminine features. He confessed to an upper-classman who had his ideal body build, Satoshi Murakami, and they started going out.   
  
Three years have passed. The two of them started living together, but there was one big change… Keita had matured and grown to be really manly! Anxious about what Satoshi, who used to be straight, thinks about the situation, Keita is distracted during sex. On the other hand, Satoshi is concerned that he cannot make love to Keita in the same manner that he used to. And then, one night, an aroused Keita pushes Satoshi down…?!
description.fr: Keita qui pendant ses années de lycée était mince et avait des traits féminins, est tombé amoureux de Satochi. Un Sempai qui avait le physique mince et masculin dont il rêvait. Keita s'est déclaré, peut-être qu'en raison de son apparence girly et mignonne, puis ils ont commencé à sortir ensemble. Trois ans plus tard, leur relation est plus forte que jamais et ils vivent actuellement comme des jeunes mariés. Cependant, il y a eu un grand changement... ! Keita est devenu un jeune homme viril ! Comme Satoshi était hétéro, Keita commence à se demander ce que son petit ami pense de cette situation. Malgré qu'ils aient des relations sexuelles..

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___

description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___

description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en: Yato is a homeless god. He doesn’t even have a shrine, not to mention worshippers! So to achieve his ambitious goals, he’s set up a service to help those in need (for a small fee), hoping he’ll eventually raise enough money to build himself the lavish temple of his dreams. Of course, he can’t afford to be picky, so Yato accepts all kinds of jobs, from finding lost kittens to helping a student overcome bullies at school.
description.pt: Yato é um deus menor, cujo sonho é ter um monte de seguidores adorá-lo e orar com ele. Infelizmente, o seu sonho está longe de se tornar realidade desde que ele não tem sequer um único santuário dedicado a ele. Para piorar as coisas, o único parceiro que tinha que o ajudava a resolver os problemas das pessoas, tinha acabado de sair do trabalho. Sua existência divina e a sorte só pode mudar quando ele se depara com Hiyori Iki e salva sua vida, um feito que também deixa em muito a situação para que ela está presa com ele até que seu problema é resolvido. Juntamente com Hiyori e sua nova Yukine parceiro de armas, Yato vai fazer tudo que puder para ganhar fama, reconhecimento e apenas talvez, um santuário dedicado a ele, também.
description.ru: «Бог, который может мечом отменить приговор.» В мире людей есть Бог, который может проникнуть в самое сердце человека. Когда вы грустите, когда вы устали, если вы посмотрите наверх, до самого рая, то увидите номер телефона. Но самое важное – не звонить! Если вы позвоните, перед вами появится парень, который с наглым выражением лица скажет: «Возрадуйся, я – Бог.» Если это произойдет, то что вы будете делать?

description.en:
You don't know how I feel, so why are you being kind to me?

Yoshi, who is super-cheerful, has a secret after-school date with Fuji, a sober boy who is the complete opposite.
It's supposed to be "practice for Fuji-kun to find a lover", but Yoshi secretly has a crush on Fuji!?
If love is revealed, this relationship will end
But his heart throbs at times when Fuji-kun is too cool!
In fact, whereabouts of the love of the super brave Gal-kun...

A plain handsome guy who doesn't know love x a brave gal-kun who is timid about love.
description.es-la:
¿Por qué eres amable conmigo si no sabes como me siento?
El alegre y fiestero Yoshi tiene citas en secreto después de la escuela con su puro opuesto, el callado Fuji.
"Es práctica para cuando consigas pareja" es la excusa que pone Yoshi, ¿¡¿pero en realidad tiene un amor no correspondido?!?
Si descubre que lo amo, esta relación llegará a su fin, ¡pero a veces Fuji-kun es tan genial que me va a mil el corazón!
¿Qué será del amor de este chico que se esfuerza por verse bonito, pero que en realidad es super valiente?
﻿
La historia BL de un chico calmado guapo que no conoce el amor y un chico bonito que es tímido en el amor pero valiente.

description.fr: > Une série réunissant une employée de pharmacie sans expression, Sa-chan, et son ami d'enfance turbulent qui est fou amoureux d'elle mais qui hésite à lui avouer son amour. Accompagnez-les dans leur quotidien plein de comédie amoureuse en travaillant dans une pharmacie.
description.id: Seri antara petugas toko obat tanpa ekspresi, Sa-chan, dan teman masa kecilnya yang riuh yang jungkir balik terhadap Sa-chan tetapi ragu-ragu dalam mengakui cintanya padanya. Bergabunglah dengan mereka dalam kehidupan sehari-hari mereka yang penuh romansa bekerja di toko obat.

description.en:
“I’m not a hero. I’m a monster that devours monsters.” In a chaotic world where ferocious monsters run rampant, there was a “monster” who inherited the title of “hero” in the holy city, the last bastion of humanity on the brink of extinction. Alice, a rookie adventurer, was attacked by a large pack of dog people (Kobolds) during her first ‘dungeon’ exploration. The one who saved her life was Leon, the third-generation “Savior” hero, who, despite having the body of a monster (Ghoul), possesses a human heart.

“I’m nothing but a defiled ghoul who keeps on killing monsters.”

“No, you’re the only hero who can save the world.”

For some reason, Alice, who admires him, applies to become Leon’s disciple.

description.en: Yuri was the hero who saved the world, being called "Demon Emperor" in his first reincarnation and "Sword Saint" in his second reincarnation. However, before he knew it, he was considered a "monster" and was shunned by people. Yuri finally gets fed up and decides to live 100% for himself next time. He reincarnates into the future and is immediately attacked by monsters. As he defends himself, Yuri acquires the skills of his previous lives and quickly annihilates his enemies. Eventually, Yuri arrives at the adventurers guild and decides to start his life as an F-rank novice adventurer while hiding his true strength.
description.id: Aizawa Yuri telah bereinkarnasi sebanyak 2x dan ia telah lelah menjadi penguasa ini dan itu. Dengan skill miliknya memungkinkan ia mendapatkan artefak reinkarnasi, dan ia memulai kesehariannya di dunia barunya!
description.ja: 一度目の転生では《魔帝》、二度目の転生では《剣聖》と呼ばれ、世界を救った勇者ユーリ。しかし、いつしか《化物》と人々に疎まれる存在になっていた。ついに嫌気が差したユーリは、次こそ100%自分のために生きると決意。未来の世界に再び転生する。その転生直後から襲い来るモンスターたち。咄嗟に対応するうちに、ユーリは次々と前世・前前世のスキルを取得し、あっという間に敵を殲滅していく。やがてギルドにたどり着いたユーリは、《魔帝》と《剣聖》の最強の力を秘めながら、Fランクの駆け出し冒険者として生活を始めることにするのだった――。

description.en:
In a world where humans and demons clash, the one who decimated the Demon Lord’s army was a lone hero named Lloyd. 

Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd’s companion!? 

This is the story of a man, hailed as the strongest, yet unable to recognize his own worth, finding a “family”.
description.ja: 人間と魔族が争う世界――魔王軍を壊滅させたのはたったひとりの勇者、ロイドという男だった。魔王から神に近いとまで言われた力を持つロイドは戦後、王により辺境の領主を命じられ、遠ざけられた。さらにその地に棲む皇帝竜の討伐も頼まれたが、早々に倒してしまう。しかし敗れた竜は、美しい女性に変化し、ロイドの伴侶になることに!?これは最強と呼ばれながらも自分自身の価値を見つけられなかった男が「家族」を見つける物語。

description.en:
The hero, Fried, confronts the demon lord with his student, Lyle. Fried killed the demon lord after a ferocious battle. “I'm going to put an end to this war!” Just as he was about to finish off the demon lord, he is betrayed by his student who attacked from behind. Fried, who was supposed to be dead, wakes up next to a demon girl who calls him the demon lord for some reason. It seems that Fried has risen as the new demon lord and will now have to protect the demonkind under his command while fighting his former comrades  
  
- [Webnovel Link](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0087ep/)

Kikuru Madan, a monster hunter with excellent performance because of his particular job in the forest, decides to quit his job because he doesn't want to waste his youth. The reason he wants to quit was that one of his friends got married. One day there is a new recruit. Enome the Guild Receptionist asks him to accompany Hitamuki Kyan the Lolipai Martial Artist to watch her back and teach her how to work. He accepts the request, half because he was worried about her and half because he wanted her to become his successor before he retires completely. Sadly, his plan to retire is derailed by Hitamuki being useless and always attracting some monster. Can Kikuru Madan retire peacefully, despite being saddled with a useless newbie?  
  
Hunting erotic commentary enthusiastically!

altTitles.ja: 風の王

description.en:
A village shrouded in the sounds of a pipe-organ. Nothing has threatened their peaceful rest, until now…  
In the night, the notes of the pipe-organ, blended with the whispers of the wind that enveloped the city, can be heard.  
Rising and falling, [or, the highs and the lows], twittering and bellowing, the beautiful chords.  
In the workshop by the entrance of the road to the village the old man is tuning the pipe-organ. The notes of a melody that beckon us toward a peaceful night: a lullaby for the village.  
But the children did not share this sentiment. To them, those notes were the voice of the king of the wind. The sonorous battle cry that would play when the king of the wind fought. The one who protected this village. The King of the Wind.

A god created AOTU World and established the 7 Oracles to rule it on behalf of this god. The poor and rich, enslaved and free, suffering and happiness, destruction and birth: every status is ordained by God. Mortals can only accept, but cannot resist. However, God has given his people the opportunity to change their fate through "AOTU Contest." The contestants use their unique "ability" gifted by the Contest System and inbate wisdom and courage in hopes of winning the competition and becoming the world's ruler.
description.vi:
Thần Sáng Thế của thế giới Ao Đột là một vị thần rất ngẫu hứng.
Ngài tạo ra vô số hành tinh và con dân trong thế giới Ao Đột, nhưng lại cai quản họ một cách tùy ý không theo quy luật --- có hành tinh màu mỡ tươi đẹp, có hành tinh cằn cỗi hoang vu, có con dân được hưởng tự do hạnh phúc, có con dân lại phải chịu sưu thuế nặng nề và lao động khổ sai.
Thần Sáng Thế thành lập ra Bảy Thần Sử, để họ thay mình thực hiện ý chỉ của thần
Thế nhưng cũng không phải là Thần Sáng Thế hoàn toàn không cho con dân mình cơ hội --- nếu như ai muốn thay đổi vận mệnh, thực hiện nguyện vọng của bản thân, vậy thì hãy tham gia "Đại chiến Ao Đột" đi! Các thí sinh sẽ được hệ thống đại chiến ban cho "năng lực đặc biệt", rèn luyện và vận dụng năng lực của riêng mình, không ngừng chiến đấu vượt qua thử thách. Chỉ cần là người chiến thắng sau cùng trong đại chiến Ao Đột là có thể đạt được tất cả, đồng thời được ban cho quyền thay mặt thần cai trị thế giới giống như Bảy Thần Sử.
Tuy nhiên, những điều trên chỉ là quan niệm giả dối, cuộc đấu này đã định sẵn không hề có kẻ chiến thắng. Cho tới khi nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Kim, xuất hiện trên sân đấu.

title.en: Founder of Diabolism (Mo Dao Zu Shi)

altTitles.ja: 魔道祖師

description.en:
As the grandmaster who founded the Demonic Sect, Wei Wuxian roamed the world in his wanton ways, hated by millions for the chaos he created. In the end, he was back-stabbed by his dearest junior brother and killed by powerful clans that combined to overpower him. He incarnates into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and is later, unwillingly, taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans—Lan Wangji, his archenemy.

This marks the start of a thrilling yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and raising children. From the mutual flirtation along the way, Wei Wuxian slowly realizes that Lan Wangji, a seemingly haughty and indifferent poker-face, holds more feelings for Wei Wuxian than he is letting on.
